steps: Solenoids consists of coil of wire wrapped around a cylindrical core
It works on principle of electromagnetism and are used in transformers
Let us look at the types.
This kind of solenoid delivers large force on intial stroke
This kind of solenoid runs on direct current
This kind of solenoid runs on direct current
It converts electromagnetic force into linear movement
